attributes.action: Not to stop driving test and theory test in lockdown
attributes.additional_details:
Because it dosent make sense to close all the driving tests etc.. 
But it's OK to leave schools,college,and universitys open 
Trains are running as normal 
Taxi's are running as normal 
Buses running as normal 
So why not driving tests?!
attributes.background:
Why close driving test centres and theory test centres durning the lockdown 
Taxi's are running as normal who have many different people in them from different households.
So why can't a driving instructor/examiner sit with his pupil for 40 to 45 min.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
